| Edit this page View Source

DownloadImagesAsync(string[], bool, Booru, CancellationToken)

Asynchronously downloads images based on the provided tags, preferences, and booru type.

Declaration
public Task<List<ImageData?>> DownloadImagesAsync(string[] tags, bool isExplicit, Booru type, CancellationToken cancel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string[] tags

An array of tags to search for.
bool isExplicit

A boolean indicating whether explicit content is allowed.
Booru type

The type of booru to search in.
CancellationToken cancel

A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<List<ImageData>>

A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result is a list of downloaded image data.
| Edit this page View Source

GetImageNew(string?[], bool, Booru, HashSet<string>, CancellationToken)

Asynchronously retrieves a new image based on the provided tags, preferences, and booru type.

Declaration
public Task<ImageData?> GetImageNew(string?[] tags, bool forceExplicit, Booru type, HashSet<string> blacklistedTags, CancellationToken cancel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string[] tags

An array of tags to search for.
bool forceExplicit

A boolean indicating whether to force explicit content.
Booru type

The type of booru to search in.
HashSet<string> blacklistedTags

A set of blacklisted tags.
CancellationToken cancel

A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<ImageData>

A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result is either the retrieved image data or null if no image is found.
